description.narrative: The Nicaragua MCA Program Administration Monitoring & Evaluation project was used in the past for accounting purposes but it is not currently an active project for the program.?It has no funds either committed or disbursed against it and has a sector code of 99810 (sector not specified).

condition.narrative: 3.3. d A performance review report on compliance with the Procurement Guidelines for the prior six (6) month period (to be delivered as a condition precedent for the quarter immediately following the applicable date of delivery of such report, as set forth in the current Audit Plan).
3.3.a A performance review report on compliance with the Environmental Guidelines (as amended from time to time) and environmental and social safeguards described in the Compact and related documents

3.3.b MCA-N has delivered an audit report (financial audit) in accordance with the Compact and Audit Plan for the prior six month period to the extent that the Audit Plan requires semi-annual financial audits.

3.3.c. A performance review report on compliance with the Fiscal Accountability Plan for the prior six (6) month period (to be delivered as a condition precedent for the quarter immediately following the applicable date of delivery of such report, as set forth in the current Audit Plan).

Administrative and Finance Director for MCA-N is selected and approved by MCC and remains engaged, or in the event the position is vacant, MCA-N is actively recruiting for the position, to the satisfaction of MCC.
Conditions precedent set forth in ?3.2 of the Disbursement Agreement have been satisfied.
Conditions precedent set forth in ?3.3 of the Disbursement Agreement have been satisfied, as applicable to the relevant Disbursement Period.
Conditions precedent set forth in ?3.4 of the Disbursement Agreement have been satisfied, as applicable to the relevant Disbursement Period.
Conditions precedent set forth in ?3.5 of the Disbursement Agreement have been satisfied.
MCA-N has duly adopted, and MCC has duly approved, a Fiscal Accountability Plan that is current and updated.
MCA-N has duly adopted, and MCC has duly approved, a Procurement Plan, and the Procurement Plan is current and updated.
MCA-N has duly adopted, and MCC has duly approved, an Audit Plan, and the Audit Plan is current and updated.
MCA-N has duly adopted, and MCC has duly approved, an M&E Plan, and the M&E Plan is current and updated.

Monitoring & Evaluation Director for MCA-N is selected and approved by MCC and remains engaged, or in the event the position is vacant, MCA-N is actively recruiting for the position, to the satisfaction of MCC.
Procurement Director for MCA-N is selected and approved by MCC and remains engaged, or in the event the position is vacant, MCA-N is actively recruiting for the position, to the satisfaction of MCC.
